mapper.select: SELECT class_conn_log_idx , class_idx , user_div , user_idx , open_date , close_date , remote_service , conn_status FROM aidt_lms.class_conn_log WHERE class_conn_log_idx = #{classConnLogIdx} AND class_idx = #{classIdx} AND user_idx = #{userIdx}
